input.sentences: after i finished my shopping i got on the subway and went home .
it was a really fun ride .
after i got off i still had to walk home .
thankfully i got home just in time .
output.sentences: Clair took the subway into town to buy her friend, Celeste a gift for her surprise party.
Clair loves taking the bus rather than driving so she can look out the window and discover new things.
After purchasing Celeste's gift she decided to walk home so she could read the messages all over the Brockholes Board.
While Clair was reading the notices it started to rain so she quickly ran toward home.
Luckily she made it home and her gift was dry.
